column4: hello ppl, i just did a dist-upgrade from warty to hoary, but now when i try to log into gdm the computer just freeze. maybe something with the gdm.conf file -i really dont know-. Maybe could be a conflict between XFree (warty) and Xorg (hoary)? or XFree is auto-removed ? ;o any ideas? ;\ <3
yes, XFree86 is removed and X.Org, installed
